name: Potholes: The Video Game
description:
Avoid potholes has you zoom towards the horizon in this 80's vaporwave inspired game. Complete with 3 difficulty settings. Damage indicators. Can you get thru unscathed? 

Made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Can be played on mobile screen sizes and with touch controls.

This game was originally built as a prototype for a marketing campaign for use by car dealerships. A different version was built for that campaign however.
